TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify login history is working as expected.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to view login history.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to view login history.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to view login history.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Select a user name in search box.Capture screenshot.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: Selected user is shown in login history user name search box.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: Selected user is shown in login history user name search box.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: Selected user is not shown in login history user name search box.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Select current date in date selector.Capture screenshot.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: Selected date is shown in login history date selector.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: Selected date is shown in login history date selector.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: Selected date is not shown in login history date selector.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Click search button and view search result.Capture screenshot.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: Login history filtered based on search criteria is only shown.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: Login history filtered based on search criteria is only shown.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: Login history filtered based on search criteria is not only shown.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Click reset button and view result.Capture screenshot.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: Full Login history was not shown.
